item.description:
Hopefully I'm going to schedule some walks during the week again.  My plan is to start them at Park St, Harvard Square, or Cleveland Circle and then branch out from there.  I'll keep them between 2 to 4 miles, but don't mind making them longer.

This one will start at Park Street and walk two miles through the Common, Public Gardens, and Beacon Hill.  Here's the map.

I set this meetup for 6:30pm, but will hang around a bit for those of you trying to find parking or relying on the T to get there.  Please call or text if you are going to be late. 

If you prefer a different weekday or start time, let me know.  I picked Wednesday because it's the middle of the week.  I can do these on Monday, Tuesday, or Wednesday.  And could probably start them anytime after 6pm.
item.how_to_find_us: See my profile picture. I'll post my cell to RSVPs.
item.name: Boston Common Loop through Beacon Hill, 2 mile walk
